Description: Holy Family sitting among ruins, and served by a multitude of cherubs. 1640 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Laurent de la Hyre
Published by: François Langlois, il Ciartres
Curator's comments: A state not described by Robert-Dumesnil, in which the legs of Virgin are stretched out; perhaps in the name of decency, the plate was quickly corrected, and this early state remains quite rare. A pair to 1874,0808.2082.
Bibliographic references: Robert-Dumesnil 1835-71 / Le Peintre-Graveur Français (I.79.5) (before state I)
Rosenberg & Thuillier 1989 / Laurent de la Hyre (175.I)
Acquisition notes: annotation in brown ink on verso, Courten's handwriting.
